Kantrowitz is basically the speed limit
for an object passing through a tube at
which point the air in front of the
object kind of bunches up and can no
longer flow around the object sort of
like compressing a syringe the object
starts pushing the air down the tube

half long paddles that use the air
around them to create pressurized

Hyperloop calls for each passenger pod
to be equipped with 28 of these bearings
this won't eliminate friction entirely
